title: Patcher Kernel
body: So this error pops up that says Patcher Kernel has stopped working. Is uninstalling and reinstalling the best thing to do? Or running as administrator?

replies.body: The kernel error is usually caused by a permissions setting that's preventing the client or patcher from launching.  Use our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get it fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Running it as administrator worked. However I was wondering if it would fix that error itself after awhile. Like next patch?
Nope, this is a local security setting with your PC and not the game.  Running as admin is a work around, and you'll want to use the guide for a permanent fix!
Ah, I was told opening League and going to repair would help?
